title: Resolve production deployment error and publish Draft Version 2 live

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the deployment error that occurs when publishing Draft Version 2 to production (live), ensuring the project can be successfully deployed without errors.

quotes: üôè Go live encountered an issue: Deployment error

acceptanceCriteria: A production (live) publish completes successfully without deployment errors.
Both backend canister and frontend assets build successfully as part of the live publish pipeline.
After live publish, the main site loads successfully and the hidden /admin route still renders the admin page.

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; keep all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo and only add backend/migration.mo changes if an upgrade requires state migration.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implement email notifications or integrate with any external email delivery service.
